scripts.dev: docker compose up -d && wait-on tcp:5432 && concurrently --names "next,server" --prefix-colors "cyan,yellow" "cd nextjs && npm run dev" "cd server && npm start"
scripts.lint: npm run lint:server && npm run lint:nextjs && npm run lint:mobile
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:server && npm run lint:fix:nextjs && npm run lint:fix:mobile
